title: GitHub Repository Creation and Management Test
description: Verify that users can successfully create a new repository, configure its settings, and manage its content. The test should confirm that all repository management features work as expected.
preConditions: User has a valid GitHub account and is logged in.
User has appropriate permissions to create repositories.

steps.expectedResult: The repository creation page loads successfully with all form fields visible.

steps.action: Enter repository details (name, description, visibility) and create the repository.
steps.expectedResult: The system creates the repository and redirects to the repository page.

steps.action: Navigate to repository settings and modify configuration options.
steps.expectedResult: Settings are saved successfully and reflected in the repository configuration.

steps.action: Add a new file to the repository.
steps.expectedResult: File is successfully added and visible in the repository file list.
